messages.subject: sheep shearing  Re: An unschooled lesson
messages.msgSnippet: How fun!  I often daydream of being a farmer, but I m just too lazy! Farming is HARD work!  I ll stick with the seven little animals I ve already got! ;p
messages.messageBody:
How fun! I often daydream of being a farmer, but I'm just too lazy!
Farming is HARD work! I'll stick with the seven little animals I've already
got! ;p Well, add hubby and make that eight...then there's the two
cats....hmm, I've often been told I have a herd of kids, so is this city
farming??? LOL

Jennifer, uselessly rambling...
